name: Leaf Lad | Polluted Lands
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 Submission [48 hr Prototype]

Humanity has cluttered our planet with litter and smoke. Join Leaf Lad on his quest to defeat pollution monsters and save Planet Earth - the only home we have.
